subject: Football (College)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: ESPN has sued Ohio State, alleging the university violated state public records law by denying requests for items related to an N.C.A.A. investigation that has led to the loss of the football coach Jim Tressel and the star quarterback Terrelle Pryor.
snippet: ESPN has sued Ohio State, alleging the university violated state public records law by denying requests for items related to an N.C.A.A. investigation that has led to the loss of the football coach Jim Tressel and the star quarterback Terrelle Pryor.
